Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、<Veigue>は大丈夫だよね！ 大丈夫だよね!?
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, <Veigue>'s going to be okay, right?! Is he gonna be okay?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、大丈夫だ。 何があっても俺たちが救う。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, he'll be fine. Whatever happens, we'll save him.

Entry.JapaneseText: まったくよ……あいつ…… 全部ひとりで抱え込みやがって……
Entry.EnglishText: Man, that guy... Why'd he have to keep everything to himself...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>……どうして私に 相談してくれなかったの……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>... Why didn't you come to me...?
